verses.text: The \w proverbs|strong="H4912"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;
To \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*; to \w perceive|strong="H0995"\w* the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*;

To \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* the \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*, \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w equity|strong="H4339"\w*;\f + \fr 1.3 \ft equity: Heb. equities\f*

To \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w subtilty|strong="H6195"\w* to the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, to the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* and \w discretion|strong="H4209"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft discretion: or, advisement\f*

A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add* will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and will \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* \w learning|strong="H3948"\w*; and a man of \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* shall \w attain|strong="H7069"\w* unto wise \w counsels|strong="H8458"\w*:

To \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H4426"\w*; the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and their dark \w sayings|strong="H2420"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft the interpretation: or, an eloquent speech\f*

¶ The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: \add but\add* \w fools|strong="H0191"\w* \w despise|strong="H0936"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft the beginning: or, the principal part\f*

My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* not the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*:

For they \add shall be\add* an \w ornament|strong="H3880"\w* of \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* unto thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w chains|strong="H6060"\w* about thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft an…: Heb. an adding\f*
¶ My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, if \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* thee, \w consent|strong="H0014"\w* thou not.

If they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* with us, let us lay \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, let us \w lurk|strong="H6845"\w* privily for the \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*:

Let us swallow them \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* as the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*; and \w whole|strong="H8549"\w*, as those that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*:

We shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* all \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*, we shall \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* with \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*:
\w Cast|strong="H5307"\w* in thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* us; let us all have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w purse|strong="H3599"\w*:

My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* not thou in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* with them; \w refrain|strong="H4513"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* from their \w path|strong="H5410"\w*:
For their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* to \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

Surely in \w vain|strong="H2600"\w* the \w net|strong="H7568"\w* is \w spread|strong="H2219"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of any \w bird|strong="H1167"\w*.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft in the…: Heb. in the eyes of every thing that hath a wing\f*
And they lay \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for their \add own\add* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; they lurk \w privily|strong="H6845"\w* for their \add own\add* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*.

So \add are\add* the \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* of every one that is \w greedy|strong="H1214"\w* of \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*; \add which\add* taketh \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w owners|strong="H1167"\w* thereof.

¶ \w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* \w crieth|strong="H7442"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*; she \w uttereth|strong="H5414"\w* her \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*:\f + \fr 1.20 \ft Wisdom: Heb. Wisdoms, that is, Excellent wisdom\f*

She \w crieth|strong="H7121"\w* in the chief \w place|strong="H7218"\w* of \w concourse|strong="H1993"\w*, in the \w openings|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* she \w uttereth|strong="H0559"\w* her \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \add saying\add*,

How long, ye simple \w ones|strong="H6612"\w*, will ye \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w simplicity|strong="H6612"\w*? and the \w scorners|strong="H3887"\w* \w delight|strong="H2530"\w* in their \w scorning|strong="H3944"\w*, and \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*?

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* you at my \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*: behold, I will pour \w out|strong="H5042"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* unto you, I will make \w known|strong="H3045"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto you.
¶ Because I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, and ye \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*; I have stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and no man \w regarded|strong="H7181"\w*;
But ye have set at \w nought|strong="H6544"\w* all my \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, and \w would|strong="H0014"\w* none of my \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*:
I also will \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* at your \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w*; I will \w mock|strong="H3932"\w* when your \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*;

When your \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* as \w desolation|strong="H7722"\w*, and your \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0857"\w* as a \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*; when \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* and \w anguish|strong="H6695"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* upon you.
Then shall they \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon me, but I will not \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*; they shall seek me \w early|strong="H7836"\w*, but they shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* me:
For that they \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and did not \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:
They \w would|strong="H0014"\w* none of my \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*: they \w despised|strong="H5006"\w* all my \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*.
Therefore shall they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of their own \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and be \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with their own \w devices|strong="H4156"\w*.

For the turning \w away|strong="H4878"\w* of the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* them, and the \w prosperity|strong="H7962"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* them.\f + \fr 1.32 \ft turning…: or, ease of the simple\f*

But whoso \w hearkeneth|strong="H8085"\w* unto me shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, and shall be \w quiet|strong="H7599"\w* from \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.
